Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: AGU is inherited as an autosomal recessive trait and occurs with a high frequency in Finland because of a founder effect .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| AGU (Aspartylglucosaminuria) |

Explanation:

The paragraph mentions a disease called "AGU" which stands for Aspartylglucosaminuria. This is the disease entity that I have identified and presented in the table. AGU is an inherited genetic disorder that is characterized by the accumulation of a particular type of sugar-protein molecule in the body's cells. It is inherited as an autosomal recessive trait and occurs with a high frequency in Finland because of a founder effect.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| AGU (Aspartylglucosaminuria) |

Explanation:

The paragraph mentions only one disease entity, which is "AGU" (Aspartylglucosaminuria). The other terms mentioned in the paragraph, such as "autosomal recessive trait" and "founder effect," are not diseases but rather genetic terms used to describe the inheritance pattern and frequency of the disease in a population. Therefore, I have only included "AGU" in the table as it is the only clear disease reference in the paragraph.
